title: When a pilgrim comes back from Hajj, is his dua answered for 40 days
transcript: like in the subcontinent again and so many other Muslim countries they say that when a pilgrim comes back from image from hatch his door is answered for 40 days where did they get this from I have no idea it does this have any authenticity to it none whatsoever totally fabricated so base your belief and conviction not on what share so-and-so say on youtube or on TV not on what share so-and-so claim or write down but rather base it on paren and on the Sunnah you
